name: I Picked up an Attribute
author: 刺猬猫漫画
content: The gaming emperor Feng Xia accidentally travelled into the era of magic and cultivation, attributes&#039 abilities and strategy can be used to defeat his opponents and each time he defeats his opponents, he can obtain the skills and attributes of the enemy, turning the world with each battle! There are also many beautiful beast-women in the world, Feng Xia destroyed the opponents with so called &quotunparalleled skills&quot and steals their power into his!
